block1.description: Strategy and business model of Grupo Genera's innovation laboratory.

block2.title: Brief
block2.subtitle: Design the technology strategy for the next 3 years, based on the development of products and services to promote financial inclusion of the unbanked sector in Mexico.
block2.text: We design using service design techniques the strategy, business model, value chain and service blueprint to implement the projects that would be more profitable for Gentera.

block3.title: results

block3.text4:

in projects with high income potential.

block3.title: results
block3.text1: We found key areas of opportunity to follow up the ideation process.
block3.text2: We shared the obstacles and motivators to continue and consolidate their businesses.
block3.text3: We identified and analyze how they perceive Podemos Progresar compared to their competitors.

block2.title: Brief

block2.text1: We design a model of attention requirements based on complexity.
block2.text2: We established guidelines for the technology, operations and management teams.
block2.text2-mobile: We established guidelines for the technology, operations and management teams.

block3.title: results
block3.text1: Intuitive and automated customer onboarding with back-end systems, increasing sales.
block3.text2: The digital transformation of the sales channel was achieved.
